meanings.definition: The act of publicly supporting or recommending a product, service, or person.
meanings.sent1: Her endorsement of the new book helped it become a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity's endorsement of the skincare product boosted its sales.
meanings.sent3: The endorsement from the famous chef made the restaurant's food taste even better.
meanings.sent4: His endorsement of the candidate was like a shining beacon of support.
meanings.sent5: The endorsement from the expert made the product seem trustworthy and reliable.

meanings.definition: The signature on the back of a check, acknowledging payment.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to sign your endorsement on the back of the check.
meanings.sent2: The endorsement on the check confirmed that the payment was received.
meanings.sent3: The endorsement on the check was like a little autograph from the bank.
meanings.sent4: Her endorsement on the check was as good as gold.
meanings.sent5: The endorsement on the check made it official and ready to be cashed.
